articles.author: Candice Choi
articles.title: EXPLAINER: How figure skaters deliver quadruple jumps - Associated Press
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — Russia’s “Quad Squad” of figure skaters will try for an Olympics podium sweep  by landing the thrilling quadruple jumps that remain rare in the women's competition.
